x4freetext: The detection system used consisted of
an array of Si-detector telescopes each formed by
a 40 mum, 50*50 mm**2, delta-E DSSSD detector
(16*16 pixels) and a 1500 mum single pad E-detector.
*By authors*.In order to check the adopted procedure,
C-12, Be-10+Au-197 elastic scattering at energies
En-cm=25.7 and 27.9 MeV, respectively, was also
measured and the expected Rutherford cross sections
